macro.name: oopIfGetOwner
macro.brief: Returns an object pointer starting by an interface pointer.
macro.details: A pointer to an object of class type @p c is returned starting from a pointer to any of the interfaces implemented by the class.
macro.param: Pointer to the interface field within the class structure.
macro.return: A pointer to an object of type @p c.

macro.name: oopIfObjectInit
macro.details: An interface structure contains only a VMT pointer and no data, the purpose of this macro is VMT initialization.
macro.param: Pointer to the interface structure to be initialized.
VMT pointer to be assigned to the interface structure.

interface.name: base_interface
interface.details: There are no methods in this interface. This interface is just meant to be the common ancestor of all interfaces used in ChibiOS.
